explains: n. 土耳其马；土耳其人

sentences.en: To ride, to hunt, to smoke like a Turk in the sunshine, there's the destiny of the white man.
sentences.cn: 骑马，打猎，像土耳其人一样在阳光下抽烟，这就是白人的命运。

sentences.en: One of them was the Big Turk, who tried to stick his big horns into all the others.
sentences.cn: 其中一个是“大嘴巴”，它总想用自己的角去顶撞别的山羊。

sentences.en: They evaded the obtrusive Turk with a sort of contempt and always managed to find the greenest bushes for themselves.
sentences.cn: 他们轻蔑地避开显眼的“大嘴巴”，并总能设法为自己找到最绿的灌木丛。
